Notice of Nondiscrimination
Central City Community Schools
400 Barber Street
Central City, IA 52214-9756Phone: (319) 438-6181
Fax: (319) 438-6110
Hours: Mon - Fri, 7:00am - 3:45pm
To contact the school via email please refer to the Contact Page to find the appropriate person
Our website's privacy policy can be found here.
